column1: Lou Malnati's Pizzeria////The useless manager did eventually show his face
column2: proclaiming "I have no idea what happened" over and over again. THAT is literally your job...to know what happened!?! I am thoroughly embarrassed for the business owner who put such incapable people in charge. This shear level of incompetence had us convinced that we were part of a hidden-camera prank TV show for nearly 3 hours.
